events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and have started reviewing your resume and portfolio carefully.
After initial screening, your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation by our technical team.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of our hiring process.
We completed the initial screening interview, and your technical background aligns well with the requirements of the software developer role.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability and enthusiasm for proceeding with the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC with our lead software engineer to assess your coding and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and the interviewers were impressed with your critical thinking and code optimization approach.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 24th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and any questions you may have.
The HR interview went well, and they appreciated your communication skills and alignment with our organizational values.
An official job offer for the software engineer position has been extended to you, detailing compensation, benefits, and the start date.
We have received your positive feedback and acceptance of the job offer; we are excited to have you join our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are moving forward with onboarding preparations and team introductions.
Your onboarding process has begun; welcome sessions, credential provisioning, and initial training courses are scheduled for your first week.
The hiring case is now closed successfully with you fully integrated into the engineering team and actively contributing to projects.
